title: Down-Pointing Red Triangle

nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description: A small red equilateral triangle, pointing downwards.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the red triangle pointed down emoji is presented with a bold, saturated red hue and a prominent glossy finish that gives it a strong, tactile presence. Apple's signature 3D shading creates a sense of depth, making the triangle appear to protrude slightly from the screen with its soft rounded edges adding a touch of modern sophistication. The downward-pointing orientation often signifies a decline, a warning, or a direction, making it a versatile symbol in various contexts on Apple devices. It can be used to indicate a drop in stock prices, a downward trend, or as a navigational cue.
